summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.0°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 627 m) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1578 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 4023 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 627.5m lower than yesterday, 530.2m lower than the past week, 1577.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1096.8m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and very little to no wind will be present. Drizzle or light rain possible, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and a mix of sun and clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
